scripts.build: mkdirp dist && npm run build-css && browserify -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t browserify-css src/js/index.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/plugin.js
scripts.watch-js: mkdirp dist && npm run build-css && watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t browserify-css src/js/index.js -o dist/plugin.js
